data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Robinson, Harold, Skvarla, John J. (2013): Lettowia, a new genus of Vernonieae from East Africa (Asteraceae). PhytoKeys 25: 47-53, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.25.5556, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.25.5556
